name: part_005
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】1st兎田ぺこらいぶ「うさぎ the MEGAMI!!」【ホロライブ⧸兎田ぺこら】 [RhUrYtAWENI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Usada Pekora performs the song 'Saikyou Megami Pekora-sama' during her 1st solo live concert.
MC section where Usada Pekora greets the audience and viewers, thanking them for coming.

subtitles.original: せーの いらっしゃいませ！
subtitles.english: One, two... Welcome!

subtitles.original: 好きが集まる場所へようこそ
subtitles.english: Welcome to the place where love gathers

subtitles.original: 非日常はスナックの中
subtitles.english: The extraordinary is inside the snack bar

subtitles.original: ここに来たなら踊らにゃ損損
subtitles.english: If you came here, you've gotta dance or you're missing out

subtitles.original: ピー・イー・ケー・オー・ラ 今は関係ない
subtitles.english: P-E-K-O-R-A, it doesn't matter right now

subtitles.original: 態度の大小とか気にしない
subtitles.english: I don't care about the size of your attitude

subtitles.original: ちゃんと見えてる
subtitles.english: I can clearly see

subtitles.original: 君のサイリウム
subtitles.english: your light sticks

subtitles.original: 今はふっと吹けば飛ぶような
subtitles.english: Right now, it's just a tiny talent

subtitles.original: 小さな小さな才能だけど
subtitles.english: that could blow away with a puff,

subtitles.original: また一歩を 見ててくれるのなら
subtitles.english: But if you keep watching my next step,

subtitles.original: どこまでも愛をあげる
subtitles.english: I'll give you love without end

subtitles.original: あなたのアイドル
subtitles.english: Your idol,

subtitles.original: サイコーはピー・イー
subtitles.english: the best is P-E-

subtitles.original: チュー！
subtitles.english: Chu!

subtitles.original: 愛も願おう 立てたアンテナ
subtitles.english: Let's pray for love, antenna up

subtitles.original: 自慢してほしいよ
subtitles.english: I want you to be proud

subtitles.original: かじってられない
subtitles.english: Can't just be nibbling,

subtitles.original: 君と君とサンバ
subtitles.english: Samba with you and you

subtitles.original: ひきこもりも ひとりしきりも
subtitles.english: Whether you're a shut-in or just keep to yourself

subtitles.original: 普段と違う顔見せてよ
subtitles.english: Show me a face I don't usually see

subtitles.original: みんな兄弟 調子どうだい
subtitles.english: Everyone's a sibling, how're you doing?

subtitles.original: なりふり構わずに
subtitles.english: Without a care for appearances

subtitles.original: ピー・イー・ダブリュー・ダブリュー・ダブリュー 今は関係ない
subtitles.english: P-E-W-W-W, it still doesn't matter

subtitles.original: 愛想の良し悪しとか気にしない
subtitles.english: I don't care about your sociability

subtitles.original: 絶好調 強すぎて 君のサイリウム
subtitles.english: In top form, too strong, your light sticks

subtitles.original: たとえ世界が終わる時も 拒まない
subtitles.english: Even if the world ends, I won't refuse

subtitles.original: ひとりぼっちを感じた時も
subtitles.english: Even when you feel all alone

subtitles.original: あなたが味方でいてくれたら 怖いものはないよね
subtitles.english: If you're on my side, there's nothing to fear

subtitles.original: 見てよ見てよ 何か始まる
subtitles.english: Look, look, something's starting,

subtitles.original: 君との物語が
subtitles.english: a story with you

subtitles.original: なんて素晴らしい景色だ
subtitles.english: What a wonderful view

subtitles.original: ピー・イー・ケー・オー・ラ 今は関係ない
subtitles.english: P-E-K-O-R-A, it doesn't matter right now

subtitles.original: 態度の大小とか気にしない
subtitles.english: I don't care about the size of your attitude

subtitles.original: ちゃんと見えてる 君のサイリウム
subtitles.english: I can clearly see your light sticks

subtitles.original: 今はふっと吹けば飛ぶような
subtitles.english: Right now, it's just a tiny talent

subtitles.original: 小さな小さな才能だけど
subtitles.english: that could blow away with a puff,

subtitles.original: 私を推してくれるのなら
subtitles.english: If you'll support me,

subtitles.original: あなたが味方でいてくれたら
subtitles.english: If you're on my side,

subtitles.original: 怖くないよ
subtitles.english: I'm not afraid

subtitles.original: どこまでも愛をあげる
subtitles.english: I'll give you love without end

subtitles.original: あなたのアイドル
subtitles.english: Your idol,

subtitles.original: サイコーはピー・イー・チュー！
subtitles.english: the best is P-E-Chu!

subtitles.original: 1st 兎田ぺこらいぶ「うさぎ the MEGAMI!!」に
subtitles.english: For coming to the 1st Usada Pekolive

subtitles.original: 来てくれて、ありぺこみーなー！
subtitles.english: 'Usagi the MEGAMI!!', thank you all!

subtitles.original: あんたたちの声、めちゃめちゃ聞こえたよー！
subtitles.english: I could hear your voices so well!

subtitles.original: もう会場地響き鳴ってたぐらいに凄かった！
subtitles.english: It was so amazing, the venue was

subtitles.original: 本当にありがとう！嬉しいよー！
subtitles.english: practically shaking! Thank you! I'm so happy!

subtitles.original: いや本当に広いよー！やっほー！見えてるよー！おー！見えてるよー！
subtitles.english: Wow, it's really huge! Yahoo! I see you! Oh! I see you!

subtitles.original: こっちも行っちゃおっかな？おー！見えてるよー！おー！見えてるよー！
subtitles.english: Maybe I'll go over here too? Oh! I see you! Oh! I see you!

subtitles.original: 広っ！おー！本当だ凄い！うわー！
subtitles.english: It's so big! Oh, you're right, amazing! Whoa!

subtitles.original: ということでついに始まりました！みんな！兎田ぺこらソロライブ！
subtitles.english: And so, it's finally begun! Everyone! Usada Pekora's solo live!

subtitles.original: 気持ちはみんな、どうですかー！？
subtitles.english: How is everyone feeling!?

subtitles.original: ぺこらもね、初っ端からみんなにボルテージガッて上げてもらって、
subtitles.english: Pekora's voltage was cranked way up by all of you from the very start,

subtitles.original: ぺこらも気持ちもう、やばぺこなんですけども！
subtitles.english: And I'm feeling totally 'yaba-peko'!
